user.name: Santiago
user.description: Computer scientist. I teach hard-core AI/ML Engineering at https://t.co/THCAAZcBMu. YouTube: https://t.co/pROi08OZYJ

fullText:
Here is a counterintuitive lesson from building agents:

The prompt is often more important than the system's architecture.

I've always been obsessed with breaking down my system into the proper number of agents and assigning responsibilities correctly, but the biggest gains in
